name: Blocksagon - Block Puzzle Line
description:
This is a very fun and exciting new number connect puzzle game that will test your logic thinking and exercise your brain.

The concept of the game is very simple. Match blocks with the same number to empty the grid.

The game shore looks easy at firs but it gets harder and more challenging as you progress.

Don't wait any more and get the game today for FREE and start practice to see if you can beat the high score.
